messages.message:
We previously supported Converse in the AIHub mobile, but we have since decided to drop that. I deleted the code and restored the landing page to the original one we created before AIHub mobile. The benefit of keeping a simple mobile landing page is that we don't have to worry about creating responsive designs for our regular desktop home page.
https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/71159
Awesome, ty @Xindi Xu! It should still be changed to Analyze and Automate… Build and Converse don’t really exist anymore, from a user perspective.
Do we also need to update the language in the desktop view?
No, those look fine! It’s explicitly the Build and Converse names that are :dead:
